ἱμάντ-ωσις, εως, ἡ,
binding with thongs, [prev. author = 5th c.AD(?): Hesychius Legal icographus]; of the straps of a car, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II piece of timber used instead of a bond-stone, [LXX+9th c.AD+]
